message.raw:
andor_solis:
 Added SetVSAmplitude() function.
andor_utils:
1) setup_acquisition() SDK commands reordered to match Andika's code.
2) acquire() is now using WaitForAcquisitionTimeOut() and not homemade_wait_for_acquisition().
